div.p: Our Vision: The Corning-Painted Post Area School District is a diverse, challenging, high performing teaching and learning community that develops inquiring, knowledgeable and caring young people who help create a better and more peaceful world.

div.div: Corning-Painted Post Area School District | 165 Charles St, Painted Post, NY 14870
